attr.title: Spooky Ghosts Dot Com
attr.desc: Spooky Ghosts Dot Com is a small metroidvania about a ghost hunter named Ruby. One Halloween night a ghost hunting job comes in, but it turns out to not be a regular gig!
attr.inst: Copy the file SpookyGhostsDotCom inside the game folder, if you have the steam version rename the file "SpookyGhostsDotCom-Steam".
